name: Symphonic Mayhem
description:
Symphonic Mayhem is a skill and strategy game that relies on both good planning and good execution (as well as plenty of luck).

Your goal is to destroy all enemy tanks, using whatever upgrades you've equipped yourself with. Most maps are also pretty deadly, which may take care of a few enemies for you.

There are many different ways to play:

1. Singleplayer - Practice up, earn money, and gain exp against AI opponents.
2. Local Multiplayer - Up to 4 people can play on one computer together. 2 can play on the keyboard. 2 more can play on gamepads. Or you can have 4 on gamepads. Or you can have 3 on gamepads and 1 on the keyboard... you get the idea.
3. Online Multiplayer - Up to 8 people can play with each other on LAN or across the internet with the help of VPN's like Hamachi or Evolve.
4. COMING SOON! Online Matchmaking - Get paired up with random people online to test your skill against the world's. Earnings from the game will be going towards setting up servers for this.

Want more strategy? There are plenty of gamemodes to play, including Capture the Flag.

New Maps, Gamemodes, Upgrades, and Skins will consistently be released to keep the game evolving.

This is the company's first release, so expect problems at the start. However, these problems will be dealt with as soon as I'm aware of them.
